main event: One shiny, semi-transparent object, resembling a white top and about half the size of a dime, was observed drifting northeast for 5 minutes.
interesting points: The observation was conducted visually from the ground., The object was observed 4 miles northwest of Middlebury, VT., The object was seen at an elevation of approximately 4000 feet., The sighting was reported by a local resident to the state police., Jet aircraft were in the vicinity shortly after the sighting but did not locate any objects.
sighted object: one shiny object like a white top
witness description: Mrs. (redacted), a housewife in Weybridge, VT, and her husband.
